title: PMS 2.0 760 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Ian Rapoport, Von Miller, Coach P's Keys With Chuck Pagano LIVE From The ThunderDome, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about tonight’s Thursday Night Football game between the Commanders and the Bears, all the fires currently surrounding the Washington Commanders and Dan Snyder allegedly having blackmail material on several owners which has resulted in him not losing his team, and everything else going on around the league as we need into week 6 of the season. Joining the progrum to give an update on all the pertinent injury news for tonight and heading into this weekend is NFL Network Senior Insider, Ian Rapoport (30:36-51:37). Later, Coach Chuck Pagano joins the progrum for his weekly Coach P’s Keys segment where he gives his keys to victory for both the Washington Commanders (1:31:42-1:54:21) and the Chicago Bears (2:11:15-2:46:32). Also joining the progrum to chat about last week’s big victory over the Pittsburgh Steelers and the massive matchup this weekend against the Kansas City Chiefs is future Hall of Famer, Defensive End for the Buffalo Bills, Von Miller (1:54:23-2:11:13). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
